description: The Falketind Power Grid Hood is the most technically functional light mid layer fleece of the bunch. Designed for those who need added warmth on an outing without the threat of overheating. Made with an 85% recycled Polyester, and 15% Elastane fabric, the highly breathable and stretchy blend of material was designed to keep you warm yet not stand in the way of your full range of motion.
name: Norrona Falketind Power Grid Hood - Mens
